bookAuthors: Natsuki Takaya, Alethea Nibley, Athena Nibley
Plot: When the infamous Akito makes an in-class appearance at the start of the school year, the Sohma family worries that his arrival will be an uncensored exercise of show-and-tell about Yuki's past. Meanwhile, when Ayame vows to rekindle his brother's lost friendship, he begins to realize that you can choose your friends but you can't choose your family - especially when they're acting like animals!
Characters: Tohru Honda, Yuki Sohma, Kyo Sohma, Shigure Sohma, Hatori Sohma, Hatsuharu Sohma, Akito Sohma, Momiji Sohma
